name: Neural Pong
description:
Play against an unbeatable Neural Network in the pong game.

This is a playable fast pong game where you can test your skill against three Neural networks:


  • The Monkey Neural Network
  • The Dude Neural Network
  • The Nexus Champion Neural Network

I bet that you will lose with The Monkey!!

Enjoy the play! :D

-----------------------------------

This game was made to test the Neuro Evolution of Augmented Topology algorithm, I'm discussing it here: https://www.youtube.com/andreacatania
